ComicInfo.Title: Last Gasp; Recycled; Museum Piece; Melton's Big Game

ComicInfo.Summary:
Last Gasp: Dave Sheridan stops Ron Turner's evil plan.
Recycled: The Aquarians, an undersea race, leave the polluted Earth for a new home on another planet.
Museum Piece: An Earth spaceship arrives at Alpha Centauri to strip its planets of their natural resources.
Melton's Big Game: A big game hunter becomes the hunted.
ComicInfo.Characters: Greg Irons [as GI],Tom Veitch [as TV],Dave Sheridan,Jocko,Shuggahoo,Ron Turner
